Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Directs the state civil service commission to design and implement a pilot location pay compensation program for state employees designated managerial or confidential
Summary: Directs the state civil service commission to design and implement a pilot location pay compensation program for state employees designated managerial or confidential that is based upon cost-of-living factors in different geographic areas of the state consistent with methodologies used by the federal government in its general schedule locality pay plan.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to directing the state civil service commission to design and implement a pilot location pay compensation program for state employees designated managerial or confidential; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
